mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from buyerboard WHERE buyerboard_category LIKE DECODE(#{buyerboard_category}, NULL, '%', #{buyerboard_category}) order by buyerboard_seq desc) tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select location_dong from locationconfirm where member_id=#{member_id}
select * from buyerboard where member_id=#{member_id} and buyerboard_seq != #{buyerboard_seq} order by buyerboard_seq desc
mapper.update: update buyerboard set buyerboard_hit = buyerboard_hit + 1 where buyerboard_seq=#{buyerboard_seq}
mapper.select: select * from interestList where sale_seq=#{buyerboard_seq} and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into interestList (interestList_seq, member_id, sale_seq, sale_status, sale_subject, sale_price, sale_logtime, sale_image1, board_name) values(seq_interestList.nextval, #{member_id}, #{buyerboard_seq}, #{buyer_status}, #{buyerboard_subject}, #{buyerboard_price}, #{buyerboard_logtime}, #{buyerboard_image1}, 'buyerboard' )
mapper.update: update interestList set sale_status=#{buyer_status}, sale_subject=#{buyerboard_subject}, sale_price=#{buyerboard_price}, sale_logtime=#{buyerboard_logtime}, sale_image1=#{buyerboard_image1} where sale_seq=#{buyerboard_seq} and member_id=#{member_id}
